dataset_info.name: merged_summary
dataset_info.description: Intersection of US tariff and trade data by HS4 product codes
dataset_info.geographic_scope: United States (including Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands)

trade_value_total.notes: Sum of all trade flows for this HS4 code

year_x.notes: Year when tariff rates were recorded

Reporter_ISO_N.description: ISO numeric country code for tariff data

ReporterName_x.description: Country name for tariff data source
ReporterName_x.notes: Full country name for tariff data

year_y.notes: Year when trade flows were recorded

ReporterCode.description: Reporter country code for trade data
ReporterCode.validation: Different from tariff data due to geographic scope

ReporterName_y.description: Country name for trade data source
ReporterName_y.notes: Includes Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands

limitations: Year mismatch: Tariff data (2023) vs Trade data (2024)
Geographic inconsistency: Trade data includes PR/USVI, tariff data doesn't
Coverage gap: Only 168 of ~1,200 possible HS4 codes have both datasets
Aggregation: Multiple tariff lines per HS4 are averaged (simple average)
Currency: All values in USD (trade data converted from 1000 USD units)
processing_notes: HS4 normalization: Product codes standardized to 4-digit format
Missing values: Rows with NaN in key columns were dropped
Duplicate handling: Multiple tariff lines aggregated by mean
Trade aggregation: Multiple trade flows summed by HS4 code

visualization: World Map: Color countries by average tariff rates
Sankey Diagrams: Flow thickness = trade value, color = tariff rate
Bar Charts: Top products by trade value or tariff rate
Scatter Plots: Trade value vs. tariff rate correlation
Heat Maps: Tariff rates by product category
